item.title: Fugly Blonde
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: Here is a basic one that I brewed up today. The homebrew store was closed so I used what I had on hand. I had one pound of golden home roasted malt on hand (25 minutes at 300 deg) so I made this one up. I kept this simple because I wanted to use the pacman yeast that I harvested from Rogue bottles. Pre Boil: 7 Gallons 10 Brix (76.5%Â efficiency)
